thread.section_title: Apex Temple Court Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (London, England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Fantastic all-round
thread.title_full: Fantastic all-round - Review of Apex Temple Court Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Frank77Bullitt
title: Fantastic all-round
text: Excellent hotel - fantastically located, spot on for the Theatres and Leicester Square. Nice room upgrade (it was my wife's birthday) to a suite which was well appointed and very comfy indeed, all room facilities topped-up. Bar not badly priced and service was okay, I would absolutely recommend the hotel to anyone looking for a quality place to stay at a reasonable price in the Theatre district.
